title: Physics
summary: Physics is the natural science of matter, involving the study of matter,[lower-alpha 1] its fundamental constituents, its motion and behavior through space and time, and the related entities of energy and force.[2] Physics is one of the most fundamental scientific disciplines, with its main goal being to understand how the universe behaves.[lower-alpha 2][3][4][5] A scientist who specializes in the field of physics is called a physicist.
